composite_breakdown_label.helper: Used as a label for the COMPOSITE_BREAKDOWN column, if it appears in the indicator data.

computation_units.helper: Unit of measurement which displays below the indicator chart.

copyright.helper: Copyright which displays below the indicator chart.

data_footnote.helper: Footnote which displays below the indicator chart.

data_non_statistical.helper: Whether the indicator is statistical (can be charted/graphed) or not.

data_notice_class.helper: A CSS class to apply to the data notice for this indicator.

data_notice_heading.helper: A title to display above the data notice for this indicator.

data_notice_text.helper: Text to display as a data notice for this indicator, intended to contain very important information which site viewers must keep in mind when using the data provided.

data_show_map.helper: Whether the indicator should display a Map tab.

data_start_values.helper: Disaggregation values for a an indicator to start with already selected

embedded_feature_footer.helper: A footer that displays below the embedded feature. Only used with either embedded_feature_url or embedded_feature_html.

embedded_feature_html.helper: Any HTML to display in another tab, after Chart/Table/etc.

embedded_feature_tab_title.helper: A title for the embedded feature tab (ie, Chart/Table/[this]). Only used with either embedded_feature_url or embedded_feature_html.

embedded_feature_title.helper: A title that displays above the embedded feature. Only used with either embedded_feature_url or embedded_feature_html.

embedded_feature_url.helper: Any URL to display as an iframe in another tab, after Chart/Table/etc.

expected_disaggregations.helper: An optional list of disaggregations (ie, data column names) to use when calculating the disaggregation status statistics.

graph_annotations.helper: This can be used to add line annotations to the graph, such as target lines to show the progress towards the 2030 goal for an indicator.

graph_limits.helper: A list of min/max limits controlling the lowest/highest values to be shown on the y-axis.

graph_stacked_disaggregation.helper: This can be used with the bar graph type to place a certain disaggregation into the same stacked bars.

graph_title.helper: The title that displays above the graph/chart.

graph_titles.helper: As an alternative to `graph_title`, this can be used to set specific titles for particular units and/or series.

graph_type.helper: What type of graph to use for the indicator.

indicator_available.helper: An optional sub-title for the indicator, which displays below the indicator name. Intended for cases where the available data is slightly different than the indicator name.

indicator_name.helper: The name for the indicator, which displays at the top of the indicator page.

national_geographical_coverage.helper: A label used in the absence of any disaggregation.

page_content.helper: Content which displays in the main content area of the indicator page.

permalink.helper: Overrides the normal path of the indicator page. Not recommended, execpt for 'standalone' indicators.

precision.helper: Control the number of decimal places for data in this indicator.

sort.helper: Override the default order in which this indicator is displayed in lists. This can be left blank, and it will be automatically determined.

standalone.helper: Whether the indicator is standalone (separate from the SDGs) or not.

tags.helper: An optional list of 'tags' to display under an indicator when it is listed on its goal page.
